meanings.definition: Material used for filling cushions or pillows.
meanings.sent1: The fibrefills made the pillow soft and comfortable.
meanings.sent2: I need more fibrefills to stuff this cushion properly.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat scattered fibrefills all over the room.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of fibrefills, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The fibrefills felt like fluffy clouds under my head.

meanings.sent1: She carefully fibrefills the cushion to make it plump.
meanings.sent2: I will fibrefills the toy bear before giving it to my niece.
meanings.sent3: He fibrefills the box so much, it's like a surprise gift every time.
meanings.sent4: Her words fibrefills my heart with warmth and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The chef fibrefills the pastry with delicious cream.

meanings.definition: The act of filling with fibrefills.
meanings.sent1: The fibrefills of the cushions was a tedious task.
meanings.sent2: His fibrefills of the pillows was done with precision.
meanings.sent3: The fibrefills of the bean bag turned into a playful pillow fight.
meanings.sent4: Her fibrefills of love and care were evident in every stitch.
meanings.sent5: The fibrefills of the quilt made it warm and cozy.
